TextView.android:text: \t\tNote: These are short descriptions of rituals commonly known in-game. Additional rituals exist but you must discover them in game. Many rituals have additional powers beyond those listed in summary!
Creates a Nature Circle that identifies Nature Magic and grants investees a 1/10 min Repel.
The caster can throw Magic Snares at will while both feet are planted.
Cleanses the land of corruption, animals will probably like you for a while.
Grants claws and an attribute from 1 of 3 different animals.
Creates a seasonal-themed crown that grants a buff based upon the season chosen.
Extends the duration of Nature rituals by 3 months per stack, max 12 months.
Creates a physical Circle barrier made from thorns that can be raised or lowered.
Choose Hunger/Senses/Speed and gain an appropriate buff.
The caster becomes immune to all immobilizing or slowing effects for a short time.
Transforms up to 5 willing casters into small/medium natural animals for an hour.
Grants a different ability based on the current season in which it is cast.
Sheathable claws that swing Magic, stack with Claws BM, and can touch cast battle magic.
Transforms the caster into a Lesser Treant.
1/ever +5 Strength for 1 hour. Stacks with other bonuses.
Allows the caster to add the Ritual prefix to a single Nature battle magic spell 1/day.
Name a target that has desecrated Nature and gain some claws to help you kill them.
Rocks, acorns, or other natural objects may be thrown for 2 Magic by the investees.
Calls for the assistance of a Fae Commoner.
Teleport from one large plant to another within line of sight.
Seed creates a burrow of magical vines to protect those within.
Opens a 2-way portal to the Wormwood.
Adds 1 year to the duration of Nature rituals.
Grants 200 Magical Armour and a x2 Vulnerability to Fire while active.
Seals the target in an impenetrable, indestructible field which suspends counts.
Attunes the Circle to a specific season and grants a unique buff based on said season.
Turns up to 5 willing targets into Dire Animals.
Creates a rod which grants 3/ever Regeneration and 3/ever Moonlight Mantle.
The target is unable to move, speak or see. Damage to the vines hurts the target.
Turns 1/ever Nature ritual effects into 1/day effects.
Summons the Hunt-Master to track and kill a defiler of Nature.
All who hear this are suddenly constricted by strong roots that are very hard to break.
Creates an underground chamber beneath the ritual circle.
Summons a powerful Angel to track and destroy a target that has desecrated Nature.
